Text: The intraregional share of global goods trade has increased by 2.7 percentage points since 2013, partially reflecting the rise of emerging-market consumption.
Effect: The intraregional share of global goods trade has increased by 2.7 percentage points since 2013
Sentence: <e2>The intraregional share of global goods trade has increased by 2.7 percentage points since 2013</e2>, partially reflecting <e1>the rise of emerging-market consumption.</e1>
